sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均含为"假设，猜想，推测"之意。
means: assume ：指有很少或完全无根据的武断推测或不合逻辑的推理。
presume ：侧重以过去经验或根据现实的某些感觉把某事认定为是事实。
suppose ：常用词，意义较广泛，指缺乏确切事实，根据一些现象进行的推测，也可指为论证而提出合乎逻辑推理的某种假定，有时仅表示自己的意见。
guess ：常用词，指毫无根据仅凭个人主观臆断或碰运气的猜测。
postulate ：指为证实一个理论的正确性而进行的假设。

example.en: Kendall is just a freshman, so he still doesn't know the use of guess-stick very well.
example.zh: 肯德尔刚上大学一年级，所以他还不太熟悉如何使用计算尺。

jx.jx_en_mean: very difficult or impossible to determine

lj.lj_ly: how well the system will work is anybody's guess.

jx.jx_en_mean: (informal)leave someone uncertain or in doubt as to one's intentions or plans
jx.jx_cn_mean: (非正式)使（某人）捉摸不透自己的意图（或计划）

entry.def: If you guess something, you give an answer or provide an opinion which may not be true because you do not have definite knowledge about the matter concerned.

example.ex: The suit was faultless: Wood guessed that he was a very successful publisher or a banker...
example.tran: 西装无可挑剔：伍德推测他可能是个相当成功的出版商或银行家。

example.ex: You can only guess at what mental suffering they endure...
example.tran: 你只能猜测他们忍受着多大的精神痛苦。

entry.def: If you guess that something is the case, you correctly form the opinion that it is the case, although you do not have definite knowledge about it.

example.ex: By now you will have guessed that I'm back in Ireland...
example.tran: 你现在应该已经猜出我回到了爱尔兰了。

example.ex: As you've probably guessed, the problem was electrical...
example.tran: 你们可能已经猜测出来了，这个问题与电有关。

entry.def: A guess is an attempt to give an answer or provide an opinion which may not be true because you do not have definite knowledge about the matter concerned.

example.ex: My guess is that the chance that these vaccines will work is zero...
example.tran: 我猜测这些疫苗根本不可能奏效。

example.ex: He'd taken her pulse and made a guess at her blood pressure...
example.tran: 他给她把过脉，估量了她的血压。

entry.def: If you say that something is anyone's guess or anybody's guess, you mean that no-one can be certain about what is really true.

example.ex: Just when this will happen is anyone's guess...
example.tran: 谁也说不准这事什么时候会发生。
谁也说不清发生了什么事。

entry.def: You say at a guess to indicate that what you are saying is only an estimate or what you believe to be true, rather than being a definite fact.

example.ex: At a guess he's been dead for two days.

entry.def: You say I guess to show that you are slightly uncertain or reluctant about what you are saying.

example.ex: I guess she thought that was pretty smart...
example.tran: 我想她可能认为那个很漂亮。

entry.def: If someone keeps you guessing, they do not tell you what you want to know.

example.ex: The author's intention is to keep everyone guessing until the bitter end...
example.tran: 这位作家打算把悲惨结局的悬念一直保留到最后。

example.ex: She was keeping everyone guessing about the latest love in her life.
example.tran: 她不让任何人知道自己最近的感情生活。

entry.def: You say guess what to draw attention to something exciting, surprising, or interesting that you are about to say.

example.ex: Guess what, I just got my first part in a movie.
example.tran: 你猜怎么着，我刚刚得到了自己的第一个电影角色。

means.word_mean: 1. a message expressing an opinion based on incomplete evidence
2. an estimate based on little or no information

sentences.sentence: "I imagine she earned a lot of money with her new novel"
"I thought to find her in a bad state"
"he didn't think to find her in the kitchen"
"I guess she is angry at me for standing her up"

means.word_mean: 2. put forward, of a guess, in spite of possible refutation;

sentences.sentence: "I am guessing that the price of real estate will rise again"
"I cannot pretend to say that you are wrong"

means.word_mean: 3. judge tentatively or form an estimate of (quantities or time);

sentences.sentence: "I estimate this chicken to weigh three pounds"
"He guessed the right number of beans in the jar and won the prize"

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: origin uncertain; perhaps from Dutch gissen, and probably related to get

sentences.en: (North Amercian English)to take a guess

sentences.en: The suit was faultless: Wood guessed that he was a very successful publisher or a banker...

sentences.cn: 摩尔根在1871年仅仅模糊地推测到的,在这里已经十分明确地发挥出来了.
sentences.en: What Morgan had only dimly guessed in 187 I is now developed in full consciousness.

sentences.cn: 我能推测出接着会发生什么事.
sentences.en: I can guess what will happen next.

sentences.cn: 汤森那时心里在想什么,只能靠推测了.
sentences.en: What went on in Townsend's mind at that point could only be guessed at.

sentences.cn: 我推测新浪和TM有个协议. 所以不完全是假的.
sentences.en: I guess Sina . com has a deal with TM. So not totally fake.

sentences.cn: 以下是一些如何用英语进行推测的例句.
sentences.en: The following sentences are examples of how to guess in English.

sentences.cn: 决策者应该能够对将来作出最好的推测.
sentences.en: Decision makers should be able to make the best guess at what the future will be.

sentences.cn: 任何试图推测帧的某个部分的内部实质意义的步调,都称为预测.
sentences.en: Prediction is any step whelloch attempts to guess the content of an area of the frame.

sentences.cn: 我们也推测出,空肠可能在应激中表现为抑制作用,且抑制作用可能是由CRFR2介导.
sentences.en: We also guess that CRFR 2 could inhibit effect of jejunum in stress.

sentences.cn: 据推测, 我该说她大约50岁.
sentences.en: At a guess, I should say she is about fifty.

sentences.cn: 我们没有必要去猜测或推测什么, 我们会及时的知道结果.
sentences.en: We don't have to guess to speculate. We will know in time.

sentences.cn: 据推测, 有远见的经济思想和经典的音乐的听众是不同的.
sentences.en: AT A guess, the target audiences for visionary economic thinking andoompah music do not overlap much.

sentences.cn: 她推测她离岸有50码远.
sentences.en: She guessed that she was 50 yards from shore.

sentences.cn: 让我们推测一下这栋楼房的高度.
sentences.en: Let us guess at the height of the building.

sentences.cn: 你的推测说服不了我们, 我们需要确凿的证据.
sentences.en: You can't convince us by your guesses. We need solid proof.

sentences.cn: 我能否推测这意味着你还看见了一些事?
sentences.en: Can I guess that means you saw something else?

sentences.cn: 决策者应该能够对将来做出最好的推测.
sentences.en: Decision makers should be able to make a best guess at what the future will be.

sentences.cn: 西装无可挑剔：伍德推测他可能是个相当成功的出版商或银行家。
sentences.en: The suit was faultless: Wood guessed that he was a very successful publisher or a banker.

sentences.cn: 他们可能3点钟到——不过这只是一个大致的猜测。
sentences.en: They might be here by 3─but that's just a rough guess (= not exact) .

sentences.cn: 这篇文章的依据是对未来可能发生什么事情的猜测。
sentences.en: The article is based on guesses about what might happen in the future.

sentences.cn: （对某事）作猜测

sentences.en: The  “ Black ” group, on the other hand, put his salary at about  ＄ 29,000, and guessed that he had only  “ some ” college experience.
sentences.from: 15年12月六级真题（第一套）| 阅读

sentences.cn: 我开始拖延时间来猜测正确答案.
sentences.en: I was stalling for time to guess the correct answer.

sentences.cn: 总统的声明澄清了种种谣传和猜测.
sentences.en: The President's statement cleared the air of rumours and guessing.

sentences.cn: 你也在找新工作? 我猜测我们俩的处境一样.
sentences.en: You're looking for new job too? I guess we're in the same boat.

sentences.cn: 这个猜测实在是太容易(做出)了,没有什么大的风险.
sentences.en: " This guess indeed is rather too easy to be quite sporting. "

sentences.cn: 为什么要让读者自己猜测 呢 ?
sentences.en: Why leave the reader guessing?

sentences.cn: 我们的结论基于全部可获得的知识, 而不是基于猜测和想象.
sentences.en: Our conclusions are based on all acquired knowledge, rather than on guesses or imagination.

sentences.cn: 在制定战略方针时,我们必须考虑到我们的猜测有可能是错误的.
sentences.en: Our strategy must take into account the possibility that our guesses are wrong.

sentences.cn: 普罗尼尔斯认为他的猜测是正确的.
sentences.en: Polonius thought his guess was right.

sentences.cn: 他一向办事精细, 从不靠运气或凭猜测.
sentences.en: He works always by rule and line, never by chance or guess.

sentences.cn: 我们猜测, 她已经竭尽全力了, 但还是给聚会蒙上了沉重的阴影.
sentences.en: We guess she did what she could , but still, a pretty downer for the party.

sentences.cn: 我进行了分类 、 合并, 并通过用代词来猜测了一下人们的性别.
sentences.en: I've done some categorizing, concatenating, and taking a guess at gender in my use of pronouns.

sentences.cn: 猜测终究是猜测.
sentences.en: One man's guess is as good as another's.

sentences.cn: 科学家猜测在金星上没有生命.
sentences.en: The scientists guess that Venus is lifeless.

sentences.cn: 这在事先很难猜测.
sentences.en: This is hard to guess in advance.

sentences.cn: 他的出身只能猜测.
sentences.en: His origins can only be guessed at.

sentences.cn: 这个工作需要技巧,直觉的猜测会起很大的作用.
sentences.en: This is an art in which intuitive guessing plays an important part.

sentences.cn: 他的猜测是对的.
sentences.en: His guess was on the nose.

sentences.cn: 他猜测航班将会延误,结果证明他是对的.
sentences.en: His guess that the flight would be delayed proved correct.

sentences.cn: 未来的事情很难臆测,大家都心中无数.
sentences.en: The future is so uncertain that one man's guess is as good as another's.

sentences.cn: 她一下子就猜中了答案。
sentences.en: She guessed the answer straight away.

sentences.cn: 假如让店主猜中了她所要买的商品的话, 他便会漫天要价, 而且在还价过程中也很难作出让步.
sentences.en: If he does guess correctly, he will price the item high, and little in the bargaining.

sentences.cn: 我是第一个猜中答案的, 老师就发给我一份奖品.
sentences.en: I am first to guess the answer, the teacher sent me a prize.

sentences.cn: “ 我猜中你现在在幻想些什么. ”
sentences.en: " I can guess the subject of your reverie. "

sentences.cn: 他猜中了谜语.
sentences.en: He guessed the riddle correctly.

sentences.cn: 你没猜中.
sentences.en: You didn't guess right.

sentences.cn: 我们猜中他的年龄,所以赢得了礼物.
sentences.en: We won the the prize by guessing his age.

sentences.cn: 她马上就猜中了答案.
sentences.en: She guessed the answer straight away.

sentences.cn: 我猜中了答案,赢得了奖品.
sentences.en: I won a prize because I guessed the right answer.

sentences.cn: 我不知道答案, 只是恰好猜中了.
sentences.en: I didn't know the answer. It was just a lucky guess.

sentences.cn: 猜中答案的人有权问下一个问题.
sentences.en: The one who guesses the answer is entitled to ask the next question.

sentences.cn: 不应以生日或者电话号码作密码, 以防别人猜中.
sentences.en: The password should not be your birthday or phone number, so no one can guess it.

sentences.cn: 您放心没人猜中是个什么字 啊 ?
sentences.en: Are you at ease a what word is nobody guesses?

sentences.cn: 第二个谜语又是被我猜中的.
sentences.en: The second riddle is, I guess by the.

sentences.cn: 现将一个未知的模拟输入信号同一个假定值进行比较.
sentences.en: Let us compare our unknown analog input signal to a " guess ".

sentences.cn: 我认为他是正确的。
sentences.en: I guess he's  right...

sentences.cn: 我想她可能认为那个很漂亮。
sentences.en: I guess she thought that was pretty smart...

sentences.cn: 我认为无知是一种罪.
sentences.en: I guess ignorance must be a sin.

sentences.cn: 我认为这样的戏决不会嫌多.
sentences.en: I guess situation comedies are one type of show that the public never gets enough of.

sentences.cn: 我认为运动员们得到了他们应得的.
sentences.en: I guess the athlete deserve what they are paid.

sentences.cn: 没能掌握抢七, 还有我认为是我最后的一个发球局.
sentences.en: ROGER FEDERER : Sort of dominating the tiebreaker, and I guess my last service game.

sentences.cn: 普罗尼尔斯认为他的猜测是正确的.
sentences.en: Polonius thought his guess was right.

sentences.cn: 莫莉: 我认为他是一个真正的明星.
sentences.en: Molly: I guess he is a real star.

sentences.cn: 我认为在经济领域,我从根本上还是个保守的人.
sentences.en: I guess deep down I am a conservative when it comes to economic management.

sentences.cn: 尽管一个可能的后果是恶性通货膨胀, 但是大家还想当然认为用药精确,毫无后顾之忧.
sentences.en: Their precise nature is anyone's guess, though one likely consequence is an onslaught of inflation.

sentences.cn: 我认为,在某种程度上, 那些仍然优秀的作品不再显得突出.
sentences.en: I guess at one level, the things that are still good end up standing out.

sentences.cn: 艾琳: 我认为我最好离你这种人远一点.
sentences.en: Irene: I guess I'd better keep people like you at a distance.

sentences.cn: 安迪: 但是姚明这次亚运没去,可能他认为NBA比亚运重要.
sentences.en: Andy: But Yao is absent Asiad, I guess he thinks NBA is more important than Asiad.

sentences.cn: 我猜他们认为无需警戒,如果我们都昏迷着.
sentences.en: I guess they figure they don't need to keep up the act if we're unconscious.

sentences.cn: 我认为我们不能总是相信直觉.
sentences.en: I guess we can't always trust our instincts.

sentences.cn: 我猜他们认为我愿意呆在小房间里.
sentences.en: I guess they thought me content to stay in cubicles.

sentences.cn: 在其他条件相同的情况下, 会认为他们更快乐, 更聪明, 更擅长交际, 更成功.
sentences.en: Other being equal, they are guessed to be happier, more intelligent, more sociable, more successful.

sentences.cn: 布雷克先生: 我想她认为他只是想胜选.
sentences.en: Mr. Black: I guess she thinks he's only trying to get elected.

sentences.cn: 我认为你们的产品可以使你们胜过竞争对手.
sentences.en: The product gives you an edge over your competition, I guess.

sentences.cn: 我认为,你在生活中不可能获得所有你想得到的东西.
sentences.en: I guess you can't have everything you want in life.

sentences.cn: 确实是那样, 但是蔡勇认为他女儿只是侥幸猜对了.
sentences.en: It was, but Cai Yong suspected that his daughter had just made a lucky guess.

sentences.cn: 我认为“谁先到,先服务谁”其实不错.
sentences.en: B: I guess first come first serve is a great idea.

sentences.cn: 我认为这关系到地图和种族对比.
sentences.en: I guess whichever is the easiest to beat which depends on map and race matchups.

sentences.cn: 我想大家都认为我和Sam谈恋爱.
sentences.en: I guess everyone thinks Sam and I are going together.

sentences.cn: 我认为他是一个易受欺骗的傻瓜.
sentences.en: I guess he was an easy mark.

sentences.cn: 我也这么认为, 天空阴沉沉的,乌云密布.
sentences.en: I guess so. The skies are dark and cloudy.

sentences.cn: 我认为像是皮质基底节变性,多系统萎缩也要考虑.
sentences.en: I guess it was surface EMG for the evaluation of tremor.

sentences.cn: “ 你认为他们最终会打仗 吗 ? ” “ 我跟你一样拿不准. ”
sentences.en: " Do you believe they intend war eventually? " " Your guess is as good as mine. "

sentences.cn: 我原以为我的答案是错误的, 但现在我认为我回答得很对.
sentences.en: I thought my answer was wrong, but I guess I hit it on the nose.

sentences.cn: 他认为这个主意能让他的出版商着迷.
sentences.en: He guessed the idea would charm his publisher.

sentences.cn: 他猜对 / 错了。
sentences.en: He guessed right/wrong .

sentences.cn: 错, 但是你几乎猜对了. 再猜一次!
sentences.en: Wrong, but you almost got it. Guess again!

sentences.cn: 教师讲谜语,启发学生猜谜语, 猜对的学生给予奖励.
sentences.en: Teacher a riddle. Guess. What is it?

sentences.cn: 你没有猜对 [ 猜错了 ].
sentences.en: You didn't guess right [ guessed wrong ].

sentences.cn: 爱德华: 你猜对了. 坐下来让我来详细告诉你.
sentences.en: Edward: You guessed it in one. Sit down and let me fill you in.

sentences.cn: 对, 你猜对了, 是搜索引擎.
sentences.en: Yes, you guessed right, is a search engine.

sentences.cn: 不管谁猜对了我手里拿的东西,这东西就给他(她).
sentences.en: Whoever guesses what I have in my hand may have it.

sentences.cn: 我猜对了,他一定是理查德·阿德里安, 他一直在找我.
sentences.en: I guessed correctly that he must be Richard Adrian , who had come looking for me.

sentences.cn: 他猜对了罐中豆子的数量,从而赢得了奖金.
sentences.en: He guessed the right number of beans in the jar and won the prize.

sentences.cn: 看哪组学生用最少的信息就能猜对.
sentences.en: The group which can guess place with the fewest words is the winner.

sentences.cn: 作家声音里流露出来的感激涕零的急切语气使他明白:他是猜对了.
sentences.en: The eagerness in the author's voice told him that he had guessed right.

sentences.cn: 普林斯顿女孩儿如果我猜对的话你愿意告诉我你是谁 吗 ?
sentences.en: SoPrinceton Girlwould you tell me who you are if I guessed it right?

sentences.cn: 对了, 你猜对了.
sentences.en: Just so. You've guessed it.

sentences.cn: 确实是那样, 但是蔡勇认为他女儿只是侥幸猜对了.
sentences.en: It was, but Cai Yong suspected that his daughter had just made a lucky guess.

sentences.en: If you guess the results, 4 A 0 B, four figures which players guess right, winning the game.

sentences.cn: 好! 给我猜对了!
sentences.en: Yeah! I guess correctly!

sentences.cn: 在听写时,有时我仅依靠模仿平时上课时听到的单词就可以猜对听写时的词汇.
sentences.en: Sometimes I just guess a dictation right because I mimic a phrase I heard in class.

sentences.cn: 呢款游戏是猜字游戏. 如果你猜对了,你就可以见到一副完整的靓女图啦!
sentences.en: Classic hangman word guessing game. Play and try to get the full manga pictures.

sentences.en: Austin: So , Princeton Girl, would you tell me who you are if I guessed it right?

sentences.en: A : So , Princeton Girl, would you tell me who you are if I guessed it right?

sentences.cn: 有些事情他猜对了。
sentences.en: He guessed right about some things.

sentences.cn: 推断词义指你对不认识的新单词可以通过文章上下文或在句子中的提示猜出该词的大意.
sentences.en: Inferring means you can guess the word meaning form the context or hints in the text.

sentences.cn: 他试图推断地层在扭曲形成时是如何变化的.
sentences.en: He tried to guess how the strata behaved at the time the contortions formed.

Sentence.sentence: When employees log in to their computers, they're shown a picture of one of their coworkers and asked to guess that person's name.
